class_notes: This is an online synchronous course.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530 or EPI 504. Use cardiovascular epidemiology to foster student's ability to critically read the pertinent scientific literature and synthesize relevant research questions.
sections: Class Nbr: 4655, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-2:50p, Instructor: Shah/Mufarreh, Status: Open
